author: Prince Rutagengwa
text: I just signed a petition to demand that the 4 police officers involved in murdered George Floyd be arrested and charged immediately. You should too: https://t.co/XDFFwmfJyE

author: Prince Rutagengwa
text: You were given this life because you are strong enough to live it. Lift others up, make a difference.

author: Prince Rutagengwa
text: It’s costing us marks really, like studying math and other courses like accounting and so, they require mostly physical attendance than this virtual one.@Rwanda_Edu instead of liking comments you should provide them. Our marks our lives @ClaudetteIrere @AUCA_Rwanda
